#Text= Jes tu'n up the fust crick beyond the bend thar , an ' climb onto a stump , an ' holler about ONCE , an ' you 'll see how the name come .

column1: #Text=He knowed Harve lived too fer over Black Mountain to go home that night , an ' he rid right across the river an ' up to Nance 's house , an ' hollered fer Harve .
#Text=Harve poked his head out'n the loft -- he knowed whut was wanted -- an ' Harve says , " Uh , come in hyeh an ' go to bed .
